import './App.css'; import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Dots from "./Components/Dots"; import TemplateLogo from "./Components/TemplatateLogo" import DummyData from "./DummyData" const RestaurantURL = "https://random-data-api.com/api/restaurant/random_restaurant" class App extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = {...DummyData} } fetchRestaurantInfo() { fetch(RestaurantURL) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(data => this.updateState(data)) } updateState(data) { this.setState({ ...data }) } handleGetRestaurantInfoClick = () => { this.fetchRestaurantInfo() } render() { return (

{/* The restaurant name goes here */}

The Best {this.state.type}

{/* By loading the src using a query string, we force a re-render of the image. If not, the image would stay the same due to it being cached. */}

{this.state.description}

Review

"{this.state.review}"

Hours

Monday

{this.state.hours.monday.opens_at} - {this.state.hours.monday.closes_at}

Tuesday

{this.state.hours.monday.opens_at} - {this.state.hours.monday.closes_at}

Wednesday

{this.state.hours.monday.opens_at} - {this.state.hours.monday.closes_at}

Thursday

{this.state.hours.monday.opens_at} - {this.state.hours.monday.closes_at}

Friday

{this.state.hours.monday.opens_at} - {this.state.hours.monday.closes_at}

Saturday

{this.state.hours.saturday.opens_at} - {this.state.hours.saturday.closes_at}

Sunday

{this.state.hours.sunday.opens_at} - {this.state.hours.sunday.closes_at}

{this.state.phone_number}

{this.state.address}

) } } export default App;
